sentences.chinese: 为了检验这个假设，研究者在斯坦福大学食堂门口发放关于约会和吃饭的问卷，一些在进去的时候填，另一些被试在出来的时候填写。

sentences.chinese: 你其实并不需要一辆车。

to have to have something or someone, because you cannot do something without them, or because you cannot continue or cannot exist without them

sentences.chinese: 每个人都可以自由参加和平的政治活动。

sentences.chinese: 最常见的错误就是把它们种得太深了。

sentences.chinese: 她总是很有礼貌。

sentences.chinese: 他俯身吻她的嘴唇。

sentences.chinese: 这是我的手套，她的在抽屉里。

sentences.chinese: 我要换上干衣服。

sentences.chinese: 这是什么意思？我让你一小时之前就要到的！

sentences.chinese: 首先，我们需要了解案子的相关事实。

sentences.chinese: 我跟市长很熟，事实上，我上周还和她一起吃过饭呢。

sentences.chinese: 很重要的会议

sentences.chinese: 那次事故给了他很大的教训。

sentences.chinese: 快乐比金钱更重要。

sentences.chinese: 了解危险所在是极为重要的。

sentences.chinese: 我隐约记得在报纸上看到过有关情况。

sentences.chinese: 如果我没记错，他们有三个孩子。

sentences.chinese: 你把钥匙放在桌子上了，想起来了吗？

sentences.chinese: 我希望他记得带酒。

sentences.chinese: 你为什么不把真相告诉我们？

sentences.chinese: 奥利弗其实不是她弟弟。

sentences.chinese: 我从来都不知道他的真实想法。

sentences.chinese: 一开始她似乎并不友善，但其实她人很好。

detailed_translations.english: used when you are talking about what actually happened or is true, rather than what people might wrongly think

sentences.english: She was older than me, but that wasn’t really a problem.
sentences.chinese: 她比我年长，不过那不算什么问题。

sentences.chinese: 她让我们解20道数学题。

sentences.chinese: 你真该听我的建议。

detailed_translations.english: an opinion you give someone about what they should do

sentences.english: The project aims to provide an analysis of children’s emotions.
sentences.chinese: 该计划旨在对儿童情绪作出分析。

sentences.english: a three-year research project
sentences.chinese: 一项为期三年的研究计划

sentences.english: The scheme will now be extended after a successful pilot project (= a small trial to test if an idea will be successful ) .
sentences.chinese: 试行成功后，该方案现在将得到推广。

sentences.english: The project is funded by Wellcome plc.
sentences.chinese: 这个项目由威康公司资助。

sentences.english: a project manager
sentences.chinese: 项目经理

sentences.english: a geography project
sentences.chinese: 一个地理课题

detailed_translations.english: a carefully planned piece of work to get information about something, to build something, to improve something etc

sentences.english: Sara had the task of preparing the agenda for meetings.
sentences.chinese: 萨拉的任务是准备会议议程。

sentences.english: I was given the task of building a fire.
sentences.chinese: 我分配到生火的任务。

sentences.english: the skills required to carry out these tasks
sentences.chinese: 执行这些任务所需要的技能

sentences.chinese: 他很快就意识到他所承担任务的艰巨性了。

sentences.english: Our first task is to gather information.
sentences.chinese: 我们的首要任务是收集信息。

sentences.english: Monkeys can be taught to do simple tasks .
sentences.chinese: 猴子能被教会做一些简单的事。

sentences.chinese: 他们有个令人头疼的工作，就是管理国家最危险的监狱。

sentences.chinese: 志愿者的任务是分发活动传单，吃力不讨好。

sentences.chinese: 独自抚养年幼的女儿不是件轻而易举的事。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of work that must be done, especially one that is difficult or unpleasant or that must be done regularly

sentences.english: the friends they made on the journey
sentences.chinese: 他们在旅途中交下的朋友

detailed_translations.english: an occasion when you travel from one place to another, especially over a long distance
an occasion when you travel from one place to another, especially over a long distance

sentences.english: Well, she won, of course.
sentences.chinese: 噢，当然是她赢啦。

sentences.english: You should of course keep copies of all your correspondence.
sentences.chinese: 你当然应该保留所有信函的复印件。

sentences.chinese: 今后当然会有遇到困难的时候。

sentences.chinese: 我们在一起工作非常开心。

sentences.chinese: 他们决定要花更多时间在一起。

sentences.chinese: 他和我父亲一起上过学。

sentences.english: Together they went back inside the villa.
sentences.chinese: 他们一起回到了别墅里。

detailed_translations.chinese: 一起；同时；相互；连续地；总共

detailed_translations.english: different from what is usual or normal

sentences.chinese: 发生这一切都怪我自己。

sentences.english: I’m making myself a sandwich.

sentences.chinese: 鸡肉和汤团

detailed_translations.english: a round lump of flour and fat mixed with water, cooked in boiling liquid and served with meat

sentences.chinese: 你有一辈子要过呢！

sentences.chinese: 他的整个态度都让我讨厌。

sentences.chinese: 天气变暖和了。

sentences.english: Slowly my eyes became accustomed to the darkness.
sentences.chinese: 我的眼睛渐渐适应了黑暗。

sentences.english: Pollution from cars has become a major problem.

sentences.english: When did you first want to become a teacher?
sentences.chinese: 你最早是什么时候想要当一名教师的？

detailed_translations.english: to start to have a feeling or quality, or to start to develop into something

sentences.english: a master chef
sentences.chinese: 手艺高超的厨师长

sentences.english: a pastry chef
sentences.chinese: 糕饼师傅

detailed_translations.english: a skilled cook, especially the main cook in a hotel or restaurant

sentences.english: I like to eat cucumber sandwiches.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢吃有黄瓜的三明治。

sentences.english: Have some cucumber.
sentences.chinese: 吃点黄瓜吧。

sentences.english: The "gurkophone" is one of their classics, made from a hollowed cucumber , a pepper and a carrot.
sentences.chinese: 黄瓜管“是他们的经典乐器之一，那是用掏空的黄瓜、辣椒和胡萝卜做的。

sentences.chinese: 菲利普把自己的大衣挂在门后的钩子上。

sentences.chinese: 她把床单晾在晒衣绳上。

detailed_translations.english: to put something in a position so that the top part is fixed or supported, and the bottom part is free to move and does not touch the ground

sentences.english: The company’s debt has ballooned in the past year.
sentences.chinese: 在过去一年里，公司的债务激增。

detailed_translations.english: to suddenly become larger in amount

sentences.chinese: 灯笼的所有者将谜语写在一张纸条上，然后将纸条展示在灯笼上。

sentences.chinese: 为了尽量使自己高兴起来，他们就用提灯制造出人造的黎明，吃着黄油面包，谈天说地，其实真正的黎明还远没有到来。

detailed_translations.english: a lamp that you can carry, consisting of a metal container with glass sides that surrounds a flame or light

sentences.chinese: 上菜用的盘子

sentences.english: an ovenproof dish
sentences.chinese: 耐热盘

sentences.english: The menu includes a wide selection of vegetarian dishes.
sentences.chinese: 菜单上有品种丰富的素食。

detailed_translations.english: a flat container with low sides, for serving food from or cooking food in

sentences.chinese: 我可不能拿谈恋爱当儿戏，对不对？

sentences.chinese: 我从不拿钱开玩笑。

sentences.chinese: 我们愕然无语。

sentences.chinese: 在警察部门干了40年后，没有什么能令我非常震惊了。

If something shocks you, it makes you feel very upset, because it involves death or suffering and because you had not expected it

sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚看着他大笑起来。

sentences.chinese: 他情不自禁地放声大笑起来。

sentences.english: He’s one of the few writers who can make me laugh out loud.
sentences.chinese: 有几位作家能让我放声大笑，他是其中之一。

sentences.english: He gave a short laugh.
sentences.chinese: 他笑了一声。

detailed_translations.english: to make sounds with your voice, usually while you are smiling, because you think something is funny
the act of laughing or the sound you make when you laugh

sentences.english: pork chops
sentences.chinese: 猪排

detailed_translations.english: the meat from pigs

sentences.chinese: 我们围桌而坐玩纸牌。

sentences.english: Gather round! I have an important announcement to make.
sentences.chinese: 大家围拢来！我有重要事情要宣布。

sentences.english: I kept the key on a chain round my neck.

sentences.english: The ballroom’s huge, with windows all the way round .
sentences.chinese: 舞厅很大，四周都是窗户。

sentences.english: There was a lovely courtyard with tables all round .
sentences.chinese: 有一个漂亮的庭院，四周都是桌子。

detailed_translations.english: surrounding or on all sides of something or someone
shaped like a circle
a round of events is a series of related events, which are part of a longer process
on the other side of something, or to the other side of it without going through it or over it

sentences.chinese: 那张桌子是什么形状的？

sentences.chinese: 可以根据树叶的形状辨认出是什么树。

sentences.chinese: 他那顶破旧的帽子已经完全变形了。

sentences.english: The plants grow in every shape and size .
sentences.chinese: 这些植物有各种形状，各种大小。

sentences.english: The children cut out shapes (= squares, triangles etc ) from the piece of cardboard.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们把卡纸片剪成各种形状。

detailed_translations.english: the form that something has, for example round, square,  triangular  etc

sentences.chinese: 一年一度的聚会

sentences.chinese: 高中同学联谊聚会

sentences.chinese: 截下一段五厘米长的木头。

sentences.chinese: 一副刀叉

sentences.chinese: 一些年轻人带着刀子防身。

sentences.chinese: 厨房用刀

sentences.chinese: 用快刀把瓜切成块。

sentences.chinese: 我闻到烧焦的气味。

sentences.chinese: 他给她倒了一杯，然后将自己的杯子斟满。

sentences.chinese: 我们一定要找个时间一起吃顿饭。

sentences.chinese: 我想约一下泰勒小姐。

sentences.chinese: 有些鸟的味觉很发达。

sentences.chinese: 她的品位很高雅。

sentences.chinese: 今天是爸爸的生日，我们打算出去吃饭庆祝一下。

sentences.chinese: 我们在家说丹麦语，这样男孩子们就不会脱离他们的语言和文化。

sentences.chinese: 在我们的文化里，问别人收入多少是不礼貌的。

sentences.chinese: 女人通常比男人长寿。

sentences.chinese: 通常我都穿黑色、灰色或者棕色的衣服。

sentences.chinese: 这段车程通常需要 15 或 20 分钟。

sentences.chinese: 你回家过圣诞节吗？

sentences.chinese: 圣诞节假期

sentences.chinese: 祝大家圣诞快乐、新年快乐！

sentences.chinese: 政府支出方面的过度浪费

detailed_translations.english: when something such as money or skills are not used in a way that is effective, useful, or sensible
to use more money, time, energy etc than is useful or sensible
waste materials, substances etc are unwanted because the good part of them has been removed

sentences.chinese: 加利福尼亚州严厉的反污染法

detailed_translations.english: the process of making air, water, soil etc dangerously dirty and not suitable for people to use, or the state of being dangerously dirty

sentences.chinese: 塑料汤匙

sentences.chinese: 塑料袋

detailed_translations.english: made of plastic

sentences.chinese: 我保证会尽到我的责任。

sentences.english: We feel it is our duty to help her.
sentences.chinese: 我们感到帮助她是我们的责任。

sentences.chinese: 地方当局有责任保持街道整洁。

sentences.chinese: 你对你丈夫和孩子负有责任。

sentences.chinese: 她的道德责任感很强。

sentences.chinese: 马丁的职责包括清洗汽车。

sentences.english: the duty on cigarettes
sentences.chinese: 香烟税

detailed_translations.english: something that you have to do because it is morally or legally right

sentences.english: The sun was shining .
sentences.chinese: 阳光照耀。

sentences.english: The moon shone brightly in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 皓月当空。

detailed_translations.chinese: 发出光；反射光，闪耀；出类拔萃，表现突出；露出；照耀；显露；出众
detailed_translations.english: to produce bright light

detailed_translations.chinese: 光亮，光泽；好天气；擦亮；晴天；擦皮鞋；鬼把戏或诡计
detailed_translations.english: the brightness that something has when light shines on it

sentences.english: I had to break a window to get into the house.
sentences.chinese: 我只得打破一扇窗户进屋。

detailed_translations.english: if you break something, you make it separate into two or more pieces, for example by hitting it, dropping it, or bending it

sentences.english: Lifeguards are trained to deal with emergencies.
sentences.chinese: 救生员接受过应对紧急情况的训练。

sentences.english: (= In case of emergency ), press the alarm button.
sentences.chinese: 遇到紧急情况，请按报警按钮。

sentences.english: The plane had to make an emergency landing.
sentences.chinese: 那架飞机不得不紧急着陆。

sentences.english: The government called an emergency meeting to discuss the crisis.
sentences.chinese: 政府召开了紧急会议，讨论这次危机。

sentences.chinese: 我能喝一杯水吗？ 我太渴了。

sentences.chinese: 他一直在花园里干活，又热又渴。

sentences.english: All this digging is thirsty work (= work that makes you want a drink ) .
sentences.chinese: 这种挖地的活干了让人口渴。

detailed_translations.chinese: 口渴的，口干的；渴望的，热望的

sentences.chinese: 他们激将他，说他不可能在1小时内擦洗40辆汽车。

detailed_translations.english: something that tests strength, skill, or ability, especially in a way that is interesting

detailed_translations.chinese: 反对， 公然反抗； 向…挑战； 对…质疑
detailed_translations.english: to refuse to accept that something is right, fair, or legal

sentences.english: You’ll just have to be patient and wait till I’m off the phone.
sentences.chinese: 你只能耐心点，等我打完电话。

sentences.chinese: 她很严厉，但对病人很好。

detailed_translations.english: able to wait calmly for a long time or to accept difficulties, people’s annoying behaviour etc without becoming angry
someone who is receiving medical treatment from a doctor or in a hospital

sentences.english: The house is in a charming situation, on a wooded hillside.
sentences.chinese: 房子位于林木茂密的小山坡上，环境十分优美。

detailed_translations.english: the type of area where a building is situated - used especially by people who sell or advertise buildings

sentences.chinese: 我们对于给顾客造成的不便表示歉意。

sentences.english: It is with great regret that I must decline your offer.
sentences.chinese: 很遗憾，我不得不谢绝你的好意。

sentences.chinese: 你怀疑过自己所作的决定是否正确吗？

sentences.chinese: 这项法案得到参议院绝大多数人的支持。

sentences.english: We strongly support the peace process.
sentences.chinese: 我们大力拥护和平进程。

detailed_translations.chinese: 支持， 支撑物， 支持者
detailed_translations.english: something that presses on something else to hold it up or in position

sentences.chinese: 医学研究

sentences.english: medical staff
sentences.chinese: 医务人员

sentences.english: a medical student
sentences.chinese: 医科学生

sentences.chinese: 患者的病史

sentences.chinese: 内科或外科疗法

detailed_translations.english: relating to medicine and the treatment of disease or injury

sentences.chinese: 明亮的光线刺痛了她的眼睛。

sentences.english: bright sunshine
sentences.chinese: 灿烂的阳光

sentences.english: a large bright room
sentences.chinese: 明亮的大房间

sentences.english: He was an exceptionally bright child.
sentences.chinese: 他是个特别聪明的孩子。

detailed_translations.english: shining strongly, or with plenty of light

sentences.english: The atmosphere was festive and jolly.
sentences.chinese: 气氛喜庆欢乐。

sentences.english: John was obviously in a festive mood .
sentences.chinese: 约翰显然喜气洋洋的。

detailed_translations.english: looking or feeling bright and cheerful in a way that seems suitable for celebrating something

sentences.english: a New Year’s Eve fireworks display
sentences.chinese: 除夕夜的烟火表演

sentences.english: Jeff and David were in the back yard setting off fireworks.
sentences.chinese: 杰夫和戴维在后院放烟花。

detailed_translations.english: a small container filled with powder that burns or explodes to produce coloured lights and noise in the sky

sentences.english: an opportunity to view the film before it goes on general release
sentences.chinese: 在影片公映之前观影的机会

detailed_translations.english: to think about something or someone in a particular way

sentences.english: Many journalists here choose to pigeon all but the most innocuous of stories.
sentences.chinese: 除了平淡乏味的报道，这儿的新闻记者将一切通过鸽子传递出去。

sentences.english: As the name implies, pigeon is an awkward pose, and it happens to be the most challenging for me.
sentences.chinese: 顾名思义，鸽子式是一个很棘手的姿势，它对于我来说是最有挑战性的。

sentences.english: Start slow with forward bends and calf stretches, move on to pigeon pose and plow at the end.
sentences.chinese: 开始时缓慢的前倾伸展和小腿伸展，然后摆出鸽子的姿势再是犁头的姿势。

detailed_translations.english: a grey bird with short legs that is common in cities

sentences.english: His strange question surprised her.
sentences.chinese: 他那奇怪的问题令她感到意外。

sentences.english: I didn’t know you two knew each other. Mind you, it doesn’t surprise me .
sentences.chinese: 我不知道你们俩认识。 尽管如此，我并不感到意外。

sentences.english: What surprised me most was that she didn’t seem to care.
sentences.chinese: 最令我感到意外的是，她好像毫不在乎。

sentences.english: The man had a look of surprise on his face.
sentences.chinese: 那人脸上一副惊讶的表情。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使诧异,使惊异,使感到意外
detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel surprised
the feeling you have when something unexpected or unusual happens

sentences.english: Her husband is about the most boring person I’ve ever met.
sentences.chinese: 她丈夫可以说是我见过的最无聊的人。

sentences.english: The job was dull and boring.
sentences.chinese: 这份工作枯燥乏味。

detailed_translations.chinese: 令人厌烦的， 乏味的， 无聊的
detailed_translations.english: not interesting in any way

sentences.english: Have you fed the cat?
sentences.chinese: 你喂猫了吗？

detailed_translations.english: to give food to a person or animal

sentences.english: a scary moment
sentences.chinese: 恐怖的一刻

sentences.english: a scary movie
sentences.chinese: 恐怖片

sentences.english: The book is both scary and funny.
sentences.chinese: 这本书既恐怖又有趣。

detailed_translations.chinese: 可怕的， 骇人的； 惊慌的， 害怕的； 胆小的， 易受惊的
detailed_translations.english: frightening

sentences.english: It’s a good idea to do some research before you buy a house.
sentences.chinese: 买房子之前作些了解，这想法很对。

sentences.english: Gould was helped in his researches by local naturalists.
sentences.chinese: 古尔德在研究过程中得到了当地博物学家的帮助。

sentences.english: He’s been researching material for a documentary.
sentences.chinese: 他一直在研究材料，准备做一个纪录片。

detailed_translations.english: the activity of finding information about something that you are interested in or need to know about
to study a subject in detail, especially in order to discover new facts or test new ideas

sentences.english: I didn’t recognize you in your uniform.
sentences.chinese: 你穿上制服我认不出你了。

sentences.english: It was malaria, but Dr Lee hadn’t recognized the symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 这是疟疾，但李医生没有认出症状。

sentences.english: One must recognise that homesickness is natural.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须承认思乡是正常的。

detailed_translations.english: to know who someone is or what something is, because you have seen, heard, experienced, or learned about them in the past

sentences.english: Teachers have no choice but to take measures to protect themselves.
sentences.chinese: 教师们别无选择，只能采取措施来保护自己。

sentences.english: Our neighbours have just bought themselves a jacuzzi.
sentences.chinese: 我们邻居刚刚买了一个按摩浴缸。

sentences.english: The kids seem very pleased with themselves.
sentences.chinese: 那些孩子好像自得其乐。

detailed_translations.english: used to show that the people who do something are affected by their own action

sentences.english: He spends hours in front of the mirror !
sentences.chinese: 他老是照镜子！

sentences.english: When I looked in the mirror I couldn’t believe it. I looked fantastic!
sentences.chinese: 我看着镜子简直不敢相信，我看上去棒极了！

sentences.english: Henry’s sad smile mirrored that of his son.
sentences.chinese: 亨利脸上那苦涩的笑容跟他儿子一模一样。

sentences.english: The economic recovery in Britain was mirrored in the US.
sentences.chinese: 美国出现了和英国相似的经济复苏。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of special glass that you can look at and see yourself in
if one thing mirrors another, it is very similar to it and may seem to copy or represent it

sentences.english: The cat lay on the sofa, washing itself.
sentences.chinese: 猫躺在沙发上把自己舔干。

sentences.english: The machine switches itself off when the process is complete.
sentences.chinese: 工作程序结束，机器会自动关闭。

sentences.english: a small local enterprise that has transformed itself into a highly successful company
sentences.chinese: 已发展为业绩喜人的公司的一家小型地方企业

detailed_translations.english: used to show that a thing, organization, animal, or baby that does something is affected by its own action

sentences.english: Maybe it’s all just a big misunderstanding.
sentences.chinese: 也许这只是一个很大的误会。

sentences.english: ‘Do you think he’ll come back?’ ‘Maybe.’
sentences.chinese: “你认为他会回来吗？”“也许会吧。”

sentences.english: Maybe they’re right, but maybe not .
sentences.chinese: 也许他们是对的，但也许不是。

sentences.english: You have talent, maybe even genius.
sentences.chinese: 你很有才能，甚至可以说有天赋。

sentences.english: He said he’d finish the work soon – maybe tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 他说他很快就会完成那项工作——也许是明天。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that something may happen or may be true but you are not certain

sentences.english: I have several suggestions.
sentences.chinese: 我有几个建议。

sentences.english: I have several methods.
sentences.chinese: 我有几个方法。

sentences.english: I have several reasons to support my view.
sentences.chinese: 我有几个理由来支持我的观点。

sentences.english: He was a kilometre out from home when the storm struck.
sentences.chinese: 暴风雨袭来时他离家有一公里远。

sentences.english: They ran to the main road and on for a kilometre until ambulances could reach them.
sentences.chinese: 接着他们就向大道跑去，到了以后再跑了一千米，直到碰到救护车。

sentences.english: Every cubic kilometre of the ring contains around 20 tiny particles of dust, making it so tenuous, it would be invisible from the inside.
sentences.chinese: 这个光环每立方公里含有约20颗尘埃微粒，结构非常稀薄，站在光环内部都看不见它本身。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring distance, equal to 1,000 metres

sentences.english: A: Yeah.But it’s easy to get lost in the forest and compass is useless there.
sentences.chinese: 是的。 但那里的森林很容易迷路，而且指南针在那儿派不上用场。

sentences.english: Of course, most men have no interest in being there and that is why they get lost in the aisles.
sentences.chinese: 当然了，大多数男人还是对在超市不感兴趣的，这也是为什么他们在过道都会迷路的原因。

sentences.english: It might seem impossible to get lost in the modern world with its ubiquity of digital maps, but there is more than one way to be lost.
sentences.chinese: 在这个到处都有电子地图的现代世界，迷路恐怕不太可能发生了，但我们还是有不只一种会导致迷失的方法。

sentences.english: I got caught speeding on the A40 yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天我在 A40 号干线公路上超速行驶被逮到。

detailed_translations.chinese: 飞驰，迅速前进，急行；加速；超速行驶
detailed_translations.english: to be driving faster than the legal limit
the rate at which something moves or travels

detailed_translations.chinese: 快速传送； 促进， 使加速
detailed_translations.english: to take someone or something somewhere very quickly

sentences.english: He’s an amazing player to watch.
sentences.chinese: 看他比赛那才叫精彩呢。

sentences.english: an amazing bargain
sentences.chinese: 令人惊喜的便宜货

detailed_translations.english: very good, especially in an unexpected way

sentences.english: Is there enough room for me?
sentences.chinese: 有足够的地方给我吗？

sentences.english: We didn't leave early enough.
sentences.chinese: 我们离开得不够早。

detailed_translations.english: used before plural or uncountable nouns to mean ‘as many or as much as sb needs or wants ’
to the necessary degree

sentences.english: I find it hard to cope with change.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得很难适应变化。

sentences.english: scientists worried about climatic change
sentences.chinese: 为气候变化感到担忧的科学家们

sentences.english: A change in personality may mean your teenager has a drug problem.
sentences.chinese: 十几岁的孩子如果性格上发生了变化，可能意味着有吸毒问题。

sentences.english: No major changes were made to the book.
sentences.chinese: 这本书没有大的修改。

sentences.english: She had a change of heart (= change in attitude ) and decided to stay.
sentences.chinese: 她改变主意，决定留下来。

sentences.english: Family life has undergone dramatic change in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来家庭生活发生了巨大的变化。

sentences.english: Matt emptied the loose change from his pockets.
sentences.chinese: 马特把口袋里所有的零钱都掏了出来。

detailed_translations.english: the process or result of something or someone becoming different

sentences.english: By hunting or gathering away from the group, both chimpanzee and dolphin moms ensure that what they find goes to their young.
sentences.chinese: 黑猩猩和海豚妈妈们远离群体打猎和收集食物，并保证他们所找到的食物都给孩子们。

sentences.english: Daniel: Yes, like a dolphin.
sentences.chinese: 丹尼尔: 嗯，像海豚一样。

detailed_translations.english: a very intelligent sea animal like a fish with a long grey pointed nose

sentences.english: ...a coat with a huge beaver collar.
sentences.chinese: …一件带有大海狸毛皮领的大衣。

detailed_translations.english: a North American animal that has thick fur and a wide flat tail, and cuts down trees with its teeth

sentences.english: It should be no wonder that you have not mastered the understanding of them all. No one ever will.
sentences.chinese: 难怪大家没有全部掌握并理解这些知识，因为根本就没人能做得到嘛！

sentences.english: He trained as a civil engineer (= one who designs and builds roads, bridges etc ).
sentences.chinese: 他接受过土木工程师培训。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to design or build roads, bridges, machines etc

sentences.english: He had dared to speak out against injustice, and overnight he became a national hero .
sentences.chinese: 他敢于站出来抨击不公正的现象，一夜之间就成了国家英雄。

sentences.english: His father was a war hero , a former fighter pilot.
sentences.chinese: 他父亲是一位战争英雄，曾经是战斗机飞行员。

sentences.english: the unsung heroes who drove convoys of aid to Bosnia
sentences.chinese: 运载援助物品到波斯尼亚的那些无名英雄

sentences.english: A man hailed as a hero for 50 years has been unmasked as a traitor.
sentences.chinese: 50年来一直被誉为英雄的人被揭发为叛徒。

sentences.english: The hero of Doctor Zhivago dies in 1929.
sentences.chinese: 《日瓦戈医生》的男主人公于1929年去世。

detailed_translations.english: a man who is admired for doing something extremely brave

sentences.english: Survivors of the crash were rescued by helicopter.
sentences.chinese: 空难的生还者被直升机救了出来。

sentences.english: a daring rescue at sea
sentences.chinese: 英勇的海上营救行动

detailed_translations.english: to save someone or something from a situation of danger or harm
when someone or something is rescued from danger

sentences.english: We found the missing piece of the jigsaw under the chair.
sentences.chinese: 我们在椅子下面找到了那块丢失的拼图。

sentences.english: The keys have been missing for ages.
sentences.chinese: 钥匙早已丢失了。

detailed_translations.english: something that is missing is not in its usual place, so that you cannot find it

sentences.english: Her mother had been dead for ten years.
sentences.chinese: 她母亲去世十年了。

sentences.english: Police are trying to contact the family of the dead man.
sentences.chinese: 警方在设法与死者的家属联系。

sentences.english: a pile of dead leaves
sentences.chinese: 一堆枯叶

sentences.english: the dead body of a young soldier
sentences.chinese: 一名年轻士兵的尸体

sentences.english: Two men were shot dead by terrorists.
sentences.chinese: 两名男子遭恐怖分子枪杀。

sentences.english: Magnus was found dead in his car.
sentences.chinese: 马格纳斯被人发现死在他自己的车里。

sentences.english: One man is still missing, presumed dead .
sentences.chinese: 仍有一人失踪，被推定已经死亡。

sentences.english: He suddenly had a heart attack and dropped dead .
sentences.chinese: 他突发心脏病猝死。

sentences.english: She was pronounced dead on arrival at the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 到达医院时她被宣告已经死亡。

sentences.english: His fellow climbers had left him for dead on the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 他的登山伙伴以为他已死，便把他留在山上走了。

sentences.english: We didn’t know if she was dead or alive.
sentences.chinese: 我们不知道她是死是活。

sentences.english: When they found him he was more dead than alive .
sentences.chinese: 他们发现他的时候，他已奄奄一息。

sentences.english: Her parents were long dead .
sentences.chinese: 她父母早就去世了。

detailed_translations.english: no longer alive

sentences.english: the Museum of Modern Art
sentences.chinese: 现代艺术博物馆

sentences.english: The museum has an extensive collection of early photographs.
sentences.chinese: 这座博物馆藏有大量早期的照片。

detailed_translations.english: a building where important  cultural, historical, or scientific objects are kept and shown to the public

sentences.english: I live on an island.
sentences.chinese: 我住在一个岛上。

sentences.english: Then one day, an English ship anchored near the island.
sentences.chinese: 然后有一天，一艘英国船在岛附近抛锚了。

sentences.english: This is because the island is so close to the equator. So you can choose to go whenever you like.
sentences.chinese: 就因为这个岛是如此接近赤道。所以只要你愿意你任何时候都可以去。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of land completely surrounded by water

sentences.english: She stood on the beach, gazing at the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 她站在海滩上，凝视着大海。

sentences.english: I like to swim in the ocean when it’s warm enough.
sentences.chinese: 海水足够暖的时候，我喜欢在海里游泳。

detailed_translations.chinese: 洋， 海洋； 许多， 大量
detailed_translations.english: the great mass of salt water that covers most of the Earth’s surface

sentences.english: There’s plenty to do and see in New York.
sentences.chinese: 在纽约有很多事可做，很多东西可看。

detailed_translations.english: a large quantity that is enough or more than enough

sentences.english: a friendly smile
sentences.chinese: 亲切的微笑

sentences.english: I’ve found a great pub – good beer and a friendly atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 我找到了一家很棒的酒馆——啤酒好，氛围也亲切。

sentences.english: a friendly match against AC Milan
sentences.chinese: 与AC米兰队的友谊赛

detailed_translations.english: behaving towards someone in a way that shows you like them and are ready to talk to them or help them

sentences.english: We had a peaceful afternoon without the children.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们不在，我们度过了一个宁静的下午。

sentences.english: It’s very peaceful out here in the woods.
sentences.chinese: 这树林里真安静。

sentences.english: the use of nuclear power for peaceful purposes
sentences.chinese: 核能的和平利用

detailed_translations.english: a peaceful time, place, or situation is quiet and calm without any worry or excitement

sentences.english: Give me a call to let me know you’ve arrived safely.
sentences.chinese: 打个电话给我，告诉我你已平安到达。

sentences.english: By the time the police arrived on the scene, the burglars had fled.
sentences.chinese: 警方赶到现场时，窃贼已经逃跑了。

sentences.english: When her wedding day arrived, she was really nervous.
sentences.chinese: 到了婚礼那天，她十分紧张。

detailed_translations.english: to get to the place you are going to

sentences.english: a tropical forest
sentences.chinese: 热带森林

sentences.english: the danger of forest fires
sentences.chinese: 发生森林火灾的危险

detailed_translations.english: a large area of land that is covered with trees

sentences.english: lion/rhino/stag etc hunt
sentences.chinese: 猎狮/犀牛/雄鹿等

sentences.english: the hunt for the missing child
sentences.chinese: 搜寻失踪儿童

sentences.english: Wolves tend to hunt in packs (= hunt in groups ) .
sentences.chinese: 狼往往成群捕猎。

detailed_translations.english: an occasion when people chase animals in order to kill or catch them
to chase animals and birds in order to kill or catch them

sentences.english: It will be dark soon.
sentences.chinese: 天很快就要黑了。

sentences.english: David arrived sooner than I expected.
sentences.chinese: 戴维到得比我预料的快。

sentences.english: ‘Who?’ ‘You’ll find out soon enough (= fairly soon ) .’
sentences.chinese: “谁？”“你很快就会知道的。”

detailed_translations.chinese: 快；不久，一会儿；立刻；宁愿
detailed_translations.english: in a short time from now, or a short time after something else happens

sentences.english: We used to believe that capitalism would soon die out.
sentences.chinese: 我们曾以为资本主义很快会消亡。

detailed_translations.english: If something dies out, it becomes less and less common and eventually disappears completely

sentences.english: The train was completely full.
sentences.chinese: 火车坐得满满的。

sentences.english: Don’t talk with your mouth full.
sentences.chinese: 嘴里塞满东西时不要说话。

sentences.english: The class is full, but you can register for next term.
sentences.chinese: 这个班已经满了，不过你可以注册下学期的。

sentences.english: The Health Centre offers a full range of services.
sentences.chinese: 医疗中心提供全套服务。

detailed_translations.english: containing as much or as many things or people as possible, so there is no space left

sentences.english: You look fantastic!
sentences.chinese: 你看上去棒极了！

sentences.english: It’s a fantastic place, really beautiful!
sentences.chinese: 这真是个好地方，漂亮极了！

detailed_translations.chinese: 极好的， 极出色的， 了不起的； 极大的； 难以相信的； 异想天开的， 不实际的； 奇异的， 古怪的
detailed_translations.english: extremely good, attractive, enjoyable etc

sentences.english: We should have the test results back within 24 hours.
sentences.chinese: 我们24小时之内应该可以拿到化验结果。

sentences.english: He fell sick and died within a matter of weeks.
sentences.chinese: 他病倒了，不出几星期就死了。

sentences.english: Within an hour of our arrival Caroline was starting to complain.
sentences.chinese: 我们到达还没有一小时，卡罗琳就开始抱怨了。

sentences.english: The real dangers to these rebels came from within.
sentences.chinese: 对于这些叛乱分子真正的危险来自内部。

detailed_translations.english: before a certain period of time has passed
Within is also an adverb

sentences.english: It’s about a page and a quarter.
sentences.chinese: 大概是一又四分之一页。

sentences.english: Cut the cake into quarters.
sentences.chinese: 把蛋糕切成四等份。

sentences.english: I’ll meet you in a quarter of an hour.
sentences.chinese: 我们一刻钟之后见。

detailed_translations.english: one of four equal parts into which something can be divided

sentences.english: a modestly equipped workshop.
sentences.chinese: 一个装备普通的车间。

detailed_translations.english: a room or building where tools and machines are used for making or repairing things

sentences.english: a flowering bush with large shiny leaves
sentences.chinese: 叶子大而油亮的开花灌木

detailed_translations.chinese: 叶子；（书籍等的）一张；扇页
detailed_translations.english: one of the flat green parts of a plant that are joined to its stem or branches

sentences.english: After 25 years of collecting recipes, she has compiled them into a cookbook.
sentences.chinese: 她搜集了25年食谱，把它们编成一本烹饪书。

sentences.english: The company collects information about consumer trends.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司搜集有关消费者趋向的信息。

sentences.english: We’ve been out collecting signatures for our petition.
sentences.chinese: 我们出去为我们的请愿征集签名。

detailed_translations.english: to get things of the same type from different places and bring them together
to get things of the same type from different places and bring them together

sentences.english: The water sparkled in the bright sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 水面在灿烂的阳光下闪闪发亮。

sentences.english: (= came in large amounts ) through the windows.
